title: Create Dual-Axis Matplotlib Plot
description: This tutorial will guide you through the steps of creating a simple plot using Matplotlib, a Python library used for data visualization. We will be using the host_subplot module to create a plot with two y-axes.

meta.title: Matplotlib Tutorial | Python Data Visualization | Lab
meta.description: Learn how to create a simple plot using Matplotlib, a powerful Python library for data visualization, with two y-axes.
meta.keywords: Matplotlib, Python, Data Visualization, Plotting, Tutorials

meta.description: 学习如何使用 Matplotlib 创建一个简单的图表，Matplotlib 是一个强大的用于数据可视化的 Python 库，带有两个 y 轴。
meta.keywords: Matplotlib, Python, 数据可视化，绘图，教程
